latest_articles.title: At least 10 killed in Israeli strikes on Lebanon, state media says
latest_articles.summary: A senior Hezbollah official is among those reported killed in air strikes on the Bekaa Valley and southern Lebanon.
latest_articles.evidence: Israeli strikes on Lebanon, state media says

latest_articles.title: At least 10 killed in Israeli strikes in Lebanon’s Bekaa valley, health ministry says
latest_articles.summary: Hezbollah leader among dead as Israel says it hit militant command centresAt least 10 people have been killed and 24 wounded – including three children – in Israeli strikes in Lebanon’s eastern Bekaa valley, the Lebanese…

latest_articles.title: Life in Beirut Beneath the Drones
latest_articles.summary: More than a year into a cease-fire, the mechanical whir of Israeli drones above the Lebanese capital is a reminder that, in many ways, the war never really ended.
